experience.title: Actuarial Analyst
responsibilities: Perform quarterly reserve valuations for Personal Lines using Chain Ladder and Bornhuetter-Ferguson methodologies.
Utilize R and SQL to develop Generalized Linear Models (GLMs) for predictive modeling of claim frequency and severity.
Collaborate with the pricing team to prepare rate filing documentation for state regulatory departments.
Automated monthly KPI reporting using VBA and Power BI, reducing manual processing time by 20%.

experience.title: Actuarial Intern
responsibilities: Assisted in the valuation of defined benefit pension plans by updating census data and discount rate assumptions.
Performed sensitivity analysis on life insurance product portfolios to evaluate the impact of fluctuating interest rates.
Supported senior consultants in auditing financial statements for compliance with ASOP standards.
Developed custom Excel tools for peer-reviewing liability calculations.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
